QuestData.Title: Sanketsu, The Burning Blade
QuestData.Description: The blade is searing hot to the touch. The jewel on its hilt stares at you, as if daring you to claim it.$B$BPerhaps someone at your garrison would be interested in seeing this weapon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Sanketsu, the Burning Blade, to Warmaster Zog at your garrison.
